BOT_NAME.description: Enter bot name of your choice here

AUTOSW_VIEW.description: Type true if you want your bot to view status updates, or false

WELCOME.description: Type true if you want your bot to send welcome/goodbye messages in groups, or false

ANTI_CALL.description: Type true if you want the bot to reject incoming calls, or false

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Type true if you want the bot to auto-block unknown numbers, or false

ANTIFOREIGN_NUMBER.description: Enter comma-separated country codes to block (e.g., 234,263)

PREFIX.description: Enter bot prefix (leave blank for multiprefix)

AUTO_RECORD.description: Type true if you want bot to show 'recording' status, or false

API_KEY.description: Your API key for external services like Zenz, Lolhuman, etc

AUTO_TYPING.description: Type true if you want the bot to show 'typing' status, or false

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Type true to keep the bot always online (recommended on Heroku/Railway)
